summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5433 for the improvement of 18th Avenue Southwest, from West Holden Street to West Henderson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 68278 as amended by Ordinances No. 68584 and 69866, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
